cause.description:
Created recently, this cause if to fund On De Grind records with the required amount of money to purchase essential studio-recording equipment.
:With Your Help, and Your Help Only This Can Get Accomplished:
1. All musicians (world-wide) should have access to a professtioal recording-studio.
2. Music is a religion.
3. Believe in Music; Believe in this Cause!
4. http://www.myspace.com/416trinity
5. http://www.myspace.com/5deuceent
cause.mission: provide inspiring musicians with a professtional studio to record.
cause.name: On De Grind studios
